memberdef.name: bapi_Handle_PSO_ImExport_verifyDataPointers

detaileddescription.para:
This is helper function, designed to verify correctness of pointers provided by BAPHandler SWC as input parameters to bapi_Handle_PSO_ImExport_prepareData function. Function verify if no NULL pointers were given. Invoked in: bapi_Handle_PSO_ImExport_prepareData
reentrant No context task context thread safe No - Integration must insure that the function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.
T_S_BapI_BAPHandlerData_PSO_ImExport_Data*
pso_ps - pointer to the main structure designed to store all elements specific for BAPHandler SWC and used by PSO_ImExport functionality [in] T_S_BapI_BAPHandlerData_PSO_ImExport_PSOUser* PSOUserBH_ps - pointer to the structure designed to store all elements specific for BAPHandler SWC and used by Active Participant functionality [in] T_S_BapI_BAPHandlerData_PSO_ImExport_ParameterMap* psoParameterMap_pa - the pointer to array of structures designed to store information about personalized parameters supported by BAPHandler SWC [in] T_S_NvM_BapHandler_PSO_ImExport* NvM_PSO_properties_pa - pointer to array of structures allocated by BAPHandler SWC to store the value of properitie and coresponding flags [in] T_S_NvM_BapHandler_PSO_ImExport* NvM_PSO_properties_default_pa - pointer to array of structures storing default value and default flags of personalized properities [in] T_S_BapI_PSO_ImExport_PSO_Data* psoData_pa - pointer to structure allocated by BAPHandler SWC to store elements of PSO_Data parameter used by PSO_ImExport functionality [in] uint8* data_pa - pointer to buffer used by PSO_ImExport functionality to exchange data with BAP interface [in] T_S_BapI_BAPHandlerData_PSO_ImExport_Functions* f_ps - pointer to structure designed to store pointer to functions provided by specific BAPHandler SWC to realize activities required by PSO_ImExport functionality when it is working
Std_ReturnType: BAP_RET_OK - the correctness of the pointers was verified with success BAP_RET_NOT_OK - verification of the correctness of the pointers failed
Globals
Affected variables: none

Function used to handle operation "Dirty" in PSO_ImExport request received by BAPHandler SWC from BAP interface. Function is invoked from BAPHandler SWC content, in function bapi_Handle_PSO_ImExport(), in case when operation "Dirty" will be recognized. The main purpose of this function is to collect and send back to OCU in the body of PSO_ImExport Status message, all dirty (previously modified) personalized parameters.
reentrant No context task context thread safe No - Integration must insure that the function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.

Function used to handle operation "ResetAllAccounts" in BAPHandler_PSOUser request received by BAPHandler SWC. Function used to handle operation "ResetActiveAccount" in BAPHandler_PSOUser request received by BAPHandler SWC. Function is invoked from BAPHandler SWC content, in function bapi_BAPHandler_PSOUser_UpdateControlCommand(), in case when operation "ResetTargetAccount" will be recognized. memberdef.name: bapi_Handle_PSO_ImExport_prepareData

detaileddescription.para:
Function used to prepare all data needed by BAPHandler_ATN library to serve Active Participant functionality and support PSO_ImExport functionality for specific BAPHandler SWC. For this purpose BAPHandler SWC has to provide to BAPHandler_ATN Library bunch of data like structures, arrays, pointers to functions which will be used to serve by BAPHandler_ATN library the role of Active Participant from the context of BAPHandler SWC base on the data provided by it. Function have to be called by the BAPHandler SWC during its initialisation phase.
reentrant No context task context thread safe No - Integration must insure that the function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.

memberdef.argsstring: (const BapIndication_et indType, const uint8 *data_pu8, const uint16 dataLen_u16, T_S_BapI_BAPHandlerData_PSO_ImExport_Data *BH_PSO_ImExport_Data_ps)
memberdef.name: bapi_Handle_PSO_ImExport

detaileddescription.para:
Function used to handle PSO_ImExport request received by BAPHandler SWC from BAP interface. Function is invoked from BAPHandler SWC content. When PSO_ImExport request is recevied by BAPHandler SWC, this function is inveked with data received in the request and with additional informations collected in T_S_BapI_BAPHandlerData_PSO_ImExport_Data structure, required for proper handling of the request. The T_S_BapI_BAPHandlerData_PSO_ImExport_Data structure is mandatory and have to be prepared by BAPHandler SWC during initialisation by invoking function bapi_Handle_PSO_ImExport_prepareData().
reentrant No context task context thread safe No - Integration must insure that the function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.
BapIndication_et
indType - type of BAP indication received from FSG [in] uint8* data_pu8 - pointer to buffer with received data [in] uint16 dataLen_u16 - length of received data [in] T_S_BapI_BAPHandlerData_PSO_ImExport_Data* BH_PSO_ImExport_Data_ps [in, out] T_S_BapI_BAPHandlerData_PSO_ImExport_Data* BH_PSO_ImExport_Data_ps - pointer to the main structure designed to store all elements specific for BAPHandler SWC and used by PSO_ImExport functionality
Std_ReturnType: BAP_RET_OK - PSO_ImExport request was handled properly BAP_RET_NOT_OK - function failed. Possible problems:
function bapi_PSO_ImExport_readHeadersData() returned negative response (validation of one of the headers failed)
number of bytes read to form message headers is bigger than expected
one of functions bapi_PSO_ImExport_exportDirtyParameters(), bapi_PSO_ImExport_exportAllParameters() or bapi_PSO_ImExport_importParameters() returned negative response
unexpected indication type of the PSO_ImExport request was recognized

Function designed to collect and prepare cyclic activities responsible for:
verification and update of availability of personalized parameters
verification and update of the value of personalized parameters
update of the Active User Slot number
verification of the status of Control Commands and executing mandatory operations
sending Change Array and Dirty notifications This function have to be called from BAPHandler SWC context cyclically, once per each BAPHandler cycle.

Function used to handle the Active User slot management. When Active User slot is changing, function synchornize data between user slots and manage the change of personalized parameters. When personalization is deactivated, User slot 0 is used as default slot to handler last valid properities as not personalized properties. This function have to be called from BAPHandler SWC context cyclically, once per each BAPHandler cycle, but can be also used on demand. Invoked in: bapi_PSO_ImExport_processPSOverification

briefdescription.para: BAPHandler_ImExport library collects all functions needed by specific BAPHandler SWC to serve Active Participant functionality and support PSO_ImExport functionality by operating on the data provided by BAPHandler SWC.
